body:
Think about it:

- Often encourage biological girls to reject “girly” things and be a “strong” (cough cough masculinized) woman.

- Are seeking to populate the female sex with biological men while encouraging girls to be tomboys and enbies.

- Feminine female characters in films are often portrayed as bimbos and shallow fools while the edgy girl is portrayed as the better one.

- Are unironically considering labeling women as “birthing people” (which sounds extremely demeaning)

- Are the main ones who enforce the existence of gender stereotypes by trying to constantly “defy” them.
body_html:
Think about it:

  • Often encourage biological girls to reject “girly” things and be a “strong” (cough cough masculinized) woman.

  • Are seeking to populate the female sex with biological men while encouraging girls to be tomboys and enbies.

  • Feminine female characters in films are often portrayed as bimbos and shallow fools while the edgy girl is portrayed as the better one.

  • Are unironically considering labeling women as “birthing people” (which sounds extremely demeaning)

  • Are the main ones who enforce the existence of gender stereotypes by trying to constantly “defy” them.

body:
Dunno why you say that. 

Your response is less strange than OP's though. He responded with silly personal attacks followed by blocking me. Must be sauced or something. Getting your panties in a bunch over what I said is kinda st00pid.

But Voat was very misogynistic. Obviously they hated non-white chicks, except occasionally the East Asians some wanted to bang, thought white women are whores. Preferred them in beekeeper suits rather than birthday suits, etc.

But I'm honestly not sure if they were worse than leftists. What I do know is it is hard to top what went on at Voat.
body_html:
Dunno why you say that.

Your response is less strange than OP's though. He responded with silly personal attacks followed by blocking me. Must be sauced or something. Getting your panties in a bunch over what I said is kinda st00pid.

But Voat was very misogynistic. Obviously they hated non-white chicks, except occasionally the East Asians some wanted to bang, thought white women are whores. Preferred them in beekeeper suits rather than birthday suits, etc.

But I'm honestly not sure if they were worse than leftists. What I do know is it is hard to top what went on at Voat.

body:
Sexism is rife within right-leaning communities, principally against women. Sexism is rife within left-leaning communities, principally against men.

So... That's me dissertation.

body:
> Feminine female characters in films are often portrayed as bimbos and shallow fools while the edgy girl is portrayed as the better one.

This is true though, except the edgy part. Girls tend to be hyperfeminine and more extreme in acting like girls while boys are more neutral with only a slight trend towards masculinity. Girls are pretty much obsessed with making sure they act as feminine as possible whereas the boys only care about acting masculine to a small degree (basically just don't be a scaredy cat and you're good). This is destructive, as women are actually biologically superior to men in most aspects except for physical strength and inconvenient reproductive organs. But their crazy attitude leads them to throw away most of this potential and the men still end up achieving more than them. Work still beats talent if talent doesn't work. However there are a few sane females on this planet and they are nearly always a prodigy.
body_html:
Feminine female characters in films are often portrayed as bimbos and shallow fools while the edgy girl is portrayed as the better one.

This is true though, except the edgy part. Girls tend to be hyperfeminine and more extreme in acting like girls while boys are more neutral with only a slight trend towards masculinity. Girls are pretty much obsessed with making sure they act as feminine as possible whereas the boys only care about acting masculine to a small degree (basically just don't be a scaredy cat and you're good). This is destructive, as women are actually biologically superior to men in most aspects except for physical strength and inconvenient reproductive organs. But their crazy attitude leads them to throw away most of this potential and the men still end up achieving more than them. Work still beats talent if talent doesn't work. However there are a few sane females on this planet and they are nearly always a prodigy.
